meaning: A celestial body moving in an elliptical orbit around a star.
A structure built to span a physical obstacle.
A place where goods and services are bought and sold.
A stringed musical instrument played with fingers or a pick.
A place where people are kept as punishment for a crime.
A group consisting of parents and children living together.
A stick of wax with a wick that burns to produce light.
A small object used for fastening clothes or starting a machine.
A small bag sewn into clothing for carrying items.
An underground passage built through hills or under roads.
